title: Do leaver buster resets sometimes?
body:
Just a general question, Do Leaver Buster resets after you're clean for like a month? 
I got one like 2 months ago,And now, after a single time i went afk (Because of internet connection, But whatever) I instantly got another 20 minutes ban.
After i finished that ban, I just got another one because of again, internet connections.

Anyone has an answer?

replies.body:
Past leaverbuster's don't go away over time. In order to stop getting penalties, you essentially need to 'prove' you aren't leaving purposefully by playing some matches beginning to end without disconnecting. 

If you want even more info, check out our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q1).

Stuff happen, It's not like i'm just enjoying ruining games (By the way, my team won without me anyways.).

Also... "Proving" it by playing 5 games without enjoying them at all because all of the mood is gone when you actually start playing won't mean i wont ever have internet connections problems.

*I guess thats what happens when a bot runs your system*
